context: Broadcom Inc. is a semiconductor and infrastructure software conglomerate focused on semiconductors, networking, storage, and enterprise software. Acquired Symantec enterprise security. Infrastructure software expansion.

competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: Semiconductor competitor in data center solutions, networking, and integrated graphics

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in wireless communication technologies and mobile/IoT markets

competitors.name: Nvidia
competitors.notes: Semiconductor competitor in AI and graphics processing, posing competitive threat to Broadcom's offerings

competitors.name: AMD
competitors.notes: Competitor in semiconductor solutions for data centers and computing

competitors.name: Texas Instruments
competitors.notes: Competitor in analog and embedded processing semiconductors

competitors.name: Marvell Technology
competitors.notes: Competitor in networking and storage semiconductor solutions

competitors.name: Micron
competitors.notes: Competitor in memory and storage semiconductor solutions

competitors.name: Cisco
competitors.notes: Competitor in networking infrastructure and solutions

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Enterprise software competitor following Broadcom's CA Technologies and Symantec acquisitions

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise software competitor in cybersecurity, automation, and infrastructure software

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Growing competitor in enterprise software and cloud solutions
